Talk_008:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_01>Ooo! The forest dweller's sword!<sp:0:4:0>Now you just gotta find the forest
dweller's spear. If you find it, bring
it to me along with the sword, please.
Talk_025:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_00>Ah! Mr. Hero! Your bow stash is still full!


The next time you stop by, make some
space in your pouch first.
Talk_026:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Oh yeah! You can keep what you found as
a gift.
Talk_009:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_00>The two treasures you gotta find are a
<clr:0000>spear <clr:ffff>and a <clr:0000>sword<clr:ffff>.

If you find them both, bring them to
me, please.
Talk_027:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_00>Hm, hard, you say? Maybe I should
choose an easier spot, then. Thank you
for the useful info, Mr. Hero!
Talk_010:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Right now the treasures are hidden <clr:0000>above<clr:ffff>
the Great Deku Tree's <clr:0000>face<clr:ffff>.

One is hidden somewhere even higher
than here... Good luck finding it!
Talk_028:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:SurpriseS_01>Oh! It...was? I wasn't expecting that...<sp:0:4:0>Well then, I'm going to have to change
the hiding place before I do the treasure
hunt with everyone.
I mean, you're super good at stuff, so I
shouldn't be surprised.<sp:5:1:0> Anyway, thank
you for the valuable info, Mr. Hero!
Talk_011:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseS_01>AHA! Hmmm, they look a little different
from what I hid, actually... Well, whatever!
You found them both in my book.
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>So, how was it? Was it hard?
Talk_012:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_01>Oh yeah! I almost forgot. I'll give you the
forest dweller's shield you found.

Also take this as a thank-you too!
Talk_014:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:QuestionNormal_00>Did you make space in your bow stash?
If your pouch is full, I can't give it to you.
Talk_015:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:Happy_01>Yayay! You found the forest dweller's
shield too!

<sp:3:0:2:0701>With that, the treasure hunt is over. But
how was it? Was it hard?
Talk_016:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Work_00>This time you just gotta find one thing.
The <clr:0000>forest dweller's shield<clr:ffff>!

It's hidden <clr:0000>below<clr:ffff> the Great Deku Tree's
<clr:0000>face<clr:ffff>. It's not hidden in his navel or on the
ground anywhere.
Talk_017:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_00>It was hard, huh? Thank you, Mr. Hero!
This is useful info!
Talk_018:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_00>It was easy, huh? Well, that's no surprise
to hearâ€”you're Mr. Hero, after all.

This is useful info for me, so thank you!
Talk_001:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_00>Hmmm... Did I do it?<sp:5:1:0> Did I hide things
well enough?

<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseS_01>Oh! Mr. Hero, is that you?


<sp:3:0:2:0701>You see, I wanted to play with everyone
by making them hunt for treasure. So I hid
stuff around the Great Deku Tree!
But I want to make sure I hid things well
enough, so I need someone to test it out.
I don't want to ruin it for the Koroks, see?
Talk_019:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_00>Okey dokey! There's more than just one
simple round to this treasure hunt.

That's right! It's time for round two! Next,
find me a <clr:0000>forest dweller's shield<clr:ffff>!

It's still hidden on the Great Deku Tree,
but this time, it's <clr:0000>below his face<clr:ffff>.

It's not hidden on the ground or in his
navel! I wonder if you'll find it this
time, hmmm.
Talk_002:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_01>Yay! Since it's for the other Koroks,
you're the only one who can help me
with this. So thanks!
The first two hidden treasures are<sp:5:1:0> a
<clr:0000>forest dweller's sword <clr:ffff>and a <clr:0000>forest
dweller's spear<clr:ffff>!
I hid them up <clr:0000>higher than the Great Deku
Tree's face<clr:ffff>. If you find them, bring them
to me!
Talk_020:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:SurpriseS_01>Aha!<sp:5:0:0> Don't tell me, don't tell me. Your
face says it all. You found something?
Talk_004:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Think_01>I need someone to test it out and make
sure I did a good job.
Talk_021: <sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Notice_01>Aha! Mr. Hero, did you find something?
Talk_005:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Notice_01>The look on your face can mean just ONE
thing. <sp:5:1:0>You've found them, haven't you?
Talk_006:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseS_01>AHA! You found both!


<sp:3:0:2:0c01>So? How was it? Was it hard?
Talk_023:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Happy_00>I prepared this prize in case you found
everything, which...you did!

<sp:3:0:2:0801>Thank you for helping me make my
treasure hunt the best it can be,
Mr. Hero!
Talk_007:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>Yippee! The forest dweller's spear!<sp:5:0:0>
But you haven't found the forest
dweller's SWORD yet, have you?
If you find it, bring me both, please.<sp:5:0:0>
<sp:0:2:2:5000><clr:0200>Hmmm, so this means<sp:5:0:0> it WAS hard.<clr:ffff><sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_024:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_00>Oh! Your bow stash is full...


If you make space in your pouch, come
see me again!
